content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-86.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- Wooden chests collecting coal at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5), (40.5,-87.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5) moving coal between components

### Mixed Ore Mining & Smelting at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Mining and smelting setup for copper and iron:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining copper and iron ore
- Transport belt system moving materials
- Stone furnaces at (-27.0,-58.0), (-23.0,-58.0), (-21.0,-58.0)
- Wooden chests for ore storage (-27.5,-59.5) and plate storage (-24.5,-58.5)
- Burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5), (-25.5,-58.5), (-20.5,-59.5) moving materials

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Large iron mining setup:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system for material movement
- Multiple burner inserters coordinating material flow

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Large smelting setup with:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters managing input/output

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=20-27)
Complete power generation setup:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric pole network extending to (7.5,20.5), (11.5,20.5)

# ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract from empty or non-existent containers
- Verify the target chest contains the items you want to extract
- Check if the chest exists at the specified position before attempting extraction

### Entity placement errors
- Multiple entities trying to occupy same space - check placement coordinates
- Ensure target location is clear before placing new entities

### Fluid system connection issues
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" - ensure proper pipe connections between boiler and engine
- Verify fluid can flow through entire pipe network

### Power issues
- Boiler shows "out of fuel" - need to establish fuel supply system
- Ensure consistent fuel supply to all burner entities

### Mining efficiency issues
- Multiple burner mining drills showing "out of fuel" - implement automated fuel delivery system
- Set up proper input/output connections for continuous operation
